name: Bowels of the machine
description:
Extremely early draft of a horror game. Includes basic mechanics and rough planning of the kinds of environments I want to push the player through.

I intend to use custom assets later in development; at present, the graphics used are courtesy of psychronic, and the audio is a mixture of OpenGameArt assets and RPGmaker defaults. 

Despite extreme lackingness of results, I'm glad I was able to add SOMETHING to the Scream Machine Jam!
